Active Projects

Timetable

Aims to be a simple time-managing android app. Create custom timetables to organise hours, days and weeks - eventually. Currently rebuilding using Butterknife and Conductor

Periodic Table

Material design inspired periodic table application, using electron

TextAdventure

The intention of the TextAdventure project is to create a new form of text adventure fit for the twenty first century.

MapGenerator

A very simple implementation of the Diamond-Square algorithm, made for my Extended Project Qualifcation. I'm also working on an Electron version, here
